thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 11 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Danish insurer Tryg launches its first service in Germany - CEO

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Danish insurer Tryg launches its first service in Germany - CEO
text:
April 11 (Reuters) - Tryg A/S chief executive Morten Hubbe says in telephone interview with Reuters:
* Q1 TOP LINE GROWTH WAS THE HIGHEST IN SIX YEARS, DRIVEN BY THE DANISH PRIVATE CUSTOMER SEGMENT
* IN Q1 THE COMPANY FOR THE FIRST TIME RECEIVED MORE CUSTOMER REQUESTS DIGITALLY THAN VIA TELEPHONE
* THE TOP LINE IS GROWING AGAIN IN THE PRIVATE SEGMENT IN NORWAY AFTER WEAK DEVELOPMENT IN 2016 AND 2017
* CUSTOMERS IN THE INDUSTRY SEGMENT IN NORWAY HAVE RECEIVED THE PRICE INCREASES IN Q1 MUCH BETTER THAN EXPECTED
* TRYG HAS LAUNCHED ITS GUARANTEE BUSINESS IN GERMANY IN 2018 IN FIRST EXPANSION OUTSIDE THE NORDIC REGION Further company coverage:
Copenhagen newsroom
